page.title: 06MAJOR EMPLOYERS IN HORSHAM
page.content: Sun Alliance and London Insurance Co. sell insurance to the public e.g: life, burglary, pensions. The 150000 square foot building is a major feature of the town centre, covering 8 floors and accomodating 1700 staff. They moved to Horsham in 1963 because it was cheaper than London but still within easy reach. A flexi-system operates whereby staff work between certain hours daily, but they can choose to start early or late. Staff sporting facilities are excellent, including football, badminton, stoolball, squash and cricket. Ciba Geigy is a large pharmaceutical company which is based in Basle, Switzerland. They make medicines and drugs for many illnesses and diseases:they have reduced testing drugs on animals by 50%, and also make drugs for animals.
